per_frame_4=

per_frame_7=tm=tm+mid/65;

per_pixel_3=
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=sect_a=if ( below(x,0.333), 1, 0 );
per_pixel_6=sect_b=if ( below(x,0.666), 1, 0 );
per_pixel_7=sect_b=if ( above(x,0.333), sect_b, 0 );
per_pixel_8=sect_c=if ( above(x,0.666), 1, 0 );
per_pixel_9=
per_pixel_10=cy_a=( sin(time/4)+sin(time/1.3) )*q1 + 0.5;
per_pixel_11=cy_b=( sin(time/3)+sin(time/1.1) )*q1 + 0.5;
per_pixel_12=cy_c=( sin(time/2)+sin(time/0.7) )*q1 + 0.5;
per_pixel_13=
per_pixel_14=cx=sect_a*0.166 + sect_b*0.5 + sect_c*0.833;

per_pixel_19=
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{ret=GetPixel(uv);
warp_3=`float d=lum(abs(uv-uv_orig))*0.6+0.003;
warp_4=`float3 one,two,three,four,five;
warp_5=`float3 sex,drugs,rock,roll,bugs;
warp_6=`float3 maxx;
warp_7=`one=max(
warp_8=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y-d))),
warp_9=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y)))
warp_10=`);
warp_11=`two=max(
warp_12=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x-d,uv.y+d))),
warp_13=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y-d)))
warp_14=`);
warp_15=`two-=roam_sin*roam_cos.zxy;
warp_16=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_17=`                      ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(roam_sin.xy),
warp_18=`                                           lum(roam_cos.yx),
warp_19=`                                           0)*0.5
warp_20=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_21=`                      ).xyz*
warp_22=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_23=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 
warp_24=`                     );
warp_25=`two *= (noise2)*1; 
warp_26=`three=max(
warp_27=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y))),
warp_28=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x,uv.y+d)))
warp_29=`);
warp_30=`four=max(
warp_31=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y-d))),
warp_32=`abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y)))
warp_33=`);
warp_34=`five=abs(ret-GetPixel(float2(uv.x+d,uv.y+d)));
warp_35=`sex=abs(one-ret);
warp_36=`drugs=abs(two-ret);
warp_37=`rock=abs(three-ret);
warp_38=`roll=abs(four-ret);
warp_39=`bugs=abs(five-ret);
warp_40=`maxx=max(one,max(two,max(three,max(four,five))));
warp_41=`maxx=saturate(maxx);
warp_42=`ret=maxx;
warp_43=`ret=(ret+GetPixel(uv+ret.xy*0.01)*0.8)/1.4;
warp_44=`}
comp_1=`float2 d, uv_y;
comp_2=`float3 dx, dy;
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`
comp_6=` float zoom =1.81;
comp_7=` float2 c = float2(0.448+q9,0.701+q10);
comp_8=` float2 my_uv2 = (uv-0.5)*zoom;
comp_9=` my_uv2 = float2(my_uv2.x*my_uv2.x - my_uv2.y*my_uv2.y, 2*my_uv2.x*my_uv2.y) + c;
comp_10=` float julia = GetPixel(my_uv2).z;
comp_11=`
comp_12=`    d = texsize.zw*3;
comp_13=`    dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_14=`    dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_15=`
comp_16=`float3 base = GetPixel(uv);
comp_17=`base-=roam_sin.wzy*roam_cos;
comp_18=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_19=`                      ((uv.xyy+float3(lum(roam_sin.xy),
comp_20=`                                           lum(roam_cos.yx),
comp_21=`                                           0)*0.5
comp_22=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_23=`                      ).xyz*
comp_24=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_25=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.2 
comp_26=`                     );
comp_27=`base *= (noise2)*1; 
comp_28=`float3 emboss = (-dx + dy + 1)*1.4;
comp_29=`float grad_x = length(float2(dx.x,dy.x));
comp_30=`float grad_y = length(float2(dx.y,dy.y));
comp_31=`
comp_32=`
comp_33=`ret = lerp( float3(0.6,0.5,0.4)*base.x*emboss.x,
comp_34=`            float3(4,2,1)*grad_x,
comp_35=`            grad_x*2
comp_36=`          ); 
comp_37=`
comp_38=`
comp_39=`ret = lerp(ret, float3(0.3,0,0), julia*4);
comp_40=`ret = lerp(ret, float3(0,0,1.4), grad_y*1.4);
comp_41=`ret = lerp(ret, 0.5, base.y*2);
comp_42=`}
comp_43=`
